text:
Hey, I'm Harmony!
These are the available general commands:
!coinflip - heads/tails
!help - Shows this menu
!hello - I will say hello to you!
!music (play | queue YOUTUBE_LINK | pause | resume | skip | stop)
!modtools - are for mods only!
!rtd xdy - dice rolls, default 20
modtools:
Hey, I'm Harmony!
These are the available modtool commands:
!modtools help - Shows this menu
!modtools timeInServer [serverid] [userid] - Shows the time in milliseconds that the user has been in the server
